reg_info.act_under: Provincial Land Tax Act   Loi sur l’impôt foncier provincial

content.content: 1.A caution filed under subsection 33 (1) of the Act shall be in Form1. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 943, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1.A caution filed under subsection 33 (1) of the Act shall be in Form1. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 943, s. 1.

content.content: 2.A notice to an owner or interested party under section 33 of the Act shall be in Form 2. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 943, s. 2. FORM 1 Provincial Land Tax Act  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 943, Form 1. FORM 2 Provincial Land Tax Act  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 943, Form 2.
content.raw_html:
2.A notice to an owner or interested party under section 33 of the Act shall be in Form 2. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 943, s. 2.

FORM 1

Provincial Land Tax Act

R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 943, Form 1.

FORM 2

R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 943, Form 2.
